scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Last Valley (1975), undated, comprise the novel's manuscripts, proofs, and revisions. The Last Valley is the final book of the epic of the west series that began with The Big Sky. It is the final book because time period ranges between early 1900 thru the post WWII years, but it was the fifth of six books published. It focuses on the societal and landscape changes in Montana in the western United States during the the beginning of the twentieth century.
